Control Name: CM-6 (1) AUTOMATED CENTRAL MANAGEMENT / APPLICATION / VERIFICATION
Control Statement: The organization employs automated mechanisms to centrally manage, apply, and verify configuration settings for [Assignment: organization-defined information system components].
